name: df-mfs
body: |- wceq(cmfs, cab(s0, wa(wa(wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, cv(s0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(s0))), emptycls), wf(cfv(cmty, cv(s0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(s0)), cfv(cmtc, cv(s0)))), wa(wss(cfv(cmax, cv(s0)), cfv(cmsta, cv(s0))), wral(s1, cfv(cmvt, cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1))), cfn)))))))
comment: Define the set of all formal systems. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
